page.title: 04CUSTOMS
page.content: The villages of Boyden Gate have revived an ancient Kentish Custom, that of {MUMMING.}There are two 'plays'. The first is a drama the cast of which includes St. George, The Black Knight, Princess Marion, a Doctor and a Dragon. St. George gets killed by the dragon but the Doctor revives him. He is killed again by the Black Knight and again revived. It is a story of the cycle of life and death. The second play is a sort of historical pageant about the {ROMAN invasion, the Saxons and Robin Hood. The tradition of the Hodden Horse was common in these parts but died out at the turn of the century. The villagers play cricket and rugby as a village team activity.
